title: Why are there no designated parking spaces for SROs in front of NHHS?  They need to be prominently visible to deter ne\'er do wells.  HOW DO WE MAKE THIS HAPPEN?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/06/why-are-there-no-designated-parking-spaces-for-school-resource-officers-in-front-of-new-hanover-high/
